long_description: Keep your Osprey Hydraulics(TM) reservoir (sold separately) operating smoothly with this replacement magnetic bite valve. Magnet on the bite valve partners with the included sternum strap magnet, giving the bite valve a place to rest when it's not in use. Fits 2013 and newer Osprey Hydraulics(TM) reservoirs with 0.25 in. hoses.
short_description: Keep your Osprey Hydraulics(TM) reservoir (sold separately) operating smoothly with this replacement magnetic bite valve.
